All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationException
    ApplicationException is a custom checked exception used to represent general application-level errors in the project.
    BaseBean
    The BaseBean class serves as a base entity for all beans in the application.
    BaseCtl
    BaseCtl is an abstract controller class that provides common functionality required by all controllers in the project.
    ChangePasswordCtl
    Controller to handle change-password requests.
    CollegeBean
    CollegeBean represents the College entity containing details such as name, address, state, city, and phone number.
    CollegeCtl
    Controller for managing College operations such as add, update, and view.
    CollegeListCtl
    Controller that handles listing, searching, pagination and bulk actions for College entities.
    CollegeModel
    CollegeModel provides CRUD and search operations for CollegeBean against the database table st_college.
    CourseBean
    CourseBean represents a course entity within the system.
    CourseCtl
    Controller for managing Course operations like add, update, view and navigation.
    CourseListCtl
    Controller that handles listing, searching, pagination and bulk actions for Course entities.
    CourseModel
    CourseModel provides CRUD and search operations for CourseBean against the database table st_course.
    DatabaseException
    DatabaseException is a custom checked exception used to indicate errors that occur while interacting with the database layer.
    DataUtility
    DataUtility provides common helper methods for converting and parsing primitive types and date/time related utilities used across the application.
    DataValidator
    DataValidator provides validation utilities for common input patterns used across the application.
    DropdownListBean
    The DropdownListBean interface defines the structure for beans that can be represented in dropdown lists.
    DuplicateRecordException
    DuplicateRecordException is thrown when an attempt is made to add or update a record that already exists in the database.
    EmailBuilder
    EmailBuilder is a utility class responsible for generating HTML-based email message bodies for different user-related actions such as registration, password recovery, and password updates.
    EmailMessage
    EmailMessage is a simple JavaBean used for encapsulating the details of an email message such as recipient address, subject, message body, and message type (HTML or plain text).
    EmailUtility
    Utility class used to send email messages using JavaMail API.
    FacultyBean
    FacultyBean represents faculty information within the system.
    FacultyCtl
    FacultyCtl is a controller servlet that manages faculty-related operations such as add, update, view and navigation.
    FacultyListCtl
    Controller that handles listing, searching, pagination and bulk actions for Faculty entities.
    FacultyModel
    FacultyModel provides CRUD and search operations for FacultyBean against the database table st_faculty.
    ForgetPasswordCtl
    ForgetPasswordCtl handles "forgot password" requests.
    FrontController
    FrontController is a servlet filter that performs session checking before any application controller is invoked.
    GetMarksheetCtl
    GetMarksheetCtl handles requests to retrieve a marksheet by roll number.
    HTMLUtility
    Utility class responsible for generating dynamic HTML select (dropdown) components for JSP pages.
    JDBCDataSource
    JDBCDataSource is a Singleton class responsible for managing all database connections using the C3P0 connection pooling library.
    LoginCtl
    LoginCtl handles authentication-related requests including sign in, sign up redirection and logout.
    MarksheetBean
    MarksheetBean represents the marksheet details of a student.
    MarksheetCtl
    MarksheetCtl is a controller servlet that handles add, update and view operations for marksheets.
    MarksheetListCtl
    MarksheetListCtl handles listing, searching, pagination and bulk actions for Marksheet entities.
    MarksheetMeritListCtl
    Controller to display the merit list of marksheets.
    MarksheetModel
    MarksheetModel provides CRUD and search operations for MarksheetBean against the database table st_marksheet.
    MyProfileCtl
    MyProfileCtl manages viewing and updating the profile of the currently logged-in user.
    ORSView
    ORSView defines application-wide constants for JSP view paths and their corresponding controller URL mappings.
    PropertyReader
    PropertyReader is a utility class used to read values from the system resource bundle file (system.properties).
    RecordNotFoundException
    RecordNotFoundException is thrown when a requested record does not exist in the database.
    RoleBean
    RoleBean represents different user roles within the application such as Admin, Student, Faculty, and Kiosk.
    RoleCtl
    RoleCtl is a controller servlet responsible for handling CRUD operations for roles.
    RoleListCtl
    RoleListCtl handles listing, searching, pagination and bulk actions for Role entities.
    RoleModel
    RoleModel provides CRUD operations and search/list utilities for RoleBean.
    ServletUtility
    ServletUtility is a helper class used in Servlets and Controllers.
    StudentBean
    StudentBean represents student information within the system.
    StudentCtl
    StudentCtl is a controller servlet responsible for handling student related operations such as add, update, view and navigation.
    StudentListCtl
    StudentListCtl handles listing, searching, pagination and bulk actions for Student entities.
    StudentModel
    StudentModel provides CRUD and search operations for StudentBean, interacting with the st_student table via JDBC.
    SubjectBean
    SubjectBean represents the subject details within the system.
    SubjectCtl
    SubjectCtl is a controller servlet that handles CRUD operations for Subject entities.
    SubjectListCtl
    SubjectListCtl handles listing, searching, pagination and bulk actions for Subject entities.
    SubjectModel
    SubjectModel provides CRUD and search operations for SubjectBean, interacting with the st_subject table via JDBC.
    TestCollegeModel  
    TestCourseModel  
    TestEmailUtility  
    TestFacultyModel  
    TestMarksheetModel  
    TestRoleModel  
    TestStudentModel  
    TestSubjectModel  
    TestTimetableModel  
    TestUserModel  
    TimetableBean
    TimetableBean represents the timetable information for examinations.
    TimetableCtl
    TimetableCtl is a controller servlet that manages timetable CRUD operations.
    TimetableListCtl
    TimetableListCtl handles listing, searching, pagination and bulk actions for Timetable entities.
    TimetableModel  
    UserBean
    UserBean represents a user of the application.
    UserCtl
    UserCtl is a controller servlet that handles user-related operations such as registration, update, form validation and preloading role list for the view.
    UserListCtl
    UserListCtl handles listing, searching, pagination and bulk actions for User entities.
    UserModel
    UserModel handles all database operations related to User entity such as add, update, delete, find, authenticate, etc.
    UserRegistrationCtl
    UserRegistrationCtl handles new user registration (Sign Up).
    WelcomeCtl
    WelcomeCtl is a simple controller servlet that forwards requests to the welcome view (home page) of the application.
